meanings.definition: To surpass in excellence or importance.
meanings.sent1: Her kindness outstating all others in the community.
meanings.sent2: The bright colors of the flowers outstating the green leaves.
meanings.sent3: The cat's ability to outstating the dog's tricks was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to his work outstating even the most hardworking individuals.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's speed on the track was truly outstating.
